Let me know if you need further assistance.

Hi Rica,

We only want to show the Black Friday offer disclaimer (the asterisk bit) on the homepage for people to refer to the promotion on the top banner, however we do not need to show it on rest of the pages. Can you please remove it from all pages except the homepage?

The asterisk bit that refers to the Black Friday offer is the part that we only want to show on homepage.

*Underwriting criteria, policy terms and conditions, limits, sub-limits and exclusions apply. Promotional Ts&Cs apply. The '$50 eGift Card' promotion offer is available from 16/11/2023 - 30/11/2023 (AEDT) via unique link by using the redemption code BLKFRIDAY50 when purchasing a new Stella Comprehensive Car Insurance policy at online checkout. Available to new Stella customers only. Not to be used in conjunction with any other offer. Limit of one gift card per customer. Prezzee do not sell insurance and insurance enquiries or enquiries regarding this offer should be directed to Stella Insurance. Exchange your Smart eGift Card for any retailer Gift Card of your choice. Must exchange for a Gift Card of equal amount. Prezzee Smart eGift Card has a 36-month expiry date for users to redeem the value for a Retailer Gift Card of choice. Once the new Gift Card has been selected new expiry dates will be set and terms and conditions apply to the specific Retailer Gift Card chosen. You need to hold your policy for 30 days and have paid your first premium or instalment to be eligible. If you do not activate the Reward Code within 2 months of it being emailed to you, you will forfeit the eGift Card. Your gift card will be emailed 35 days from commencement date of your policy that remain active. You must activate your Reward Card within 2 months of it being emailed to you. You are only entitled to one digital reward voucher during the offer period even if you purchase more than one eligible insurance policy. For more details, please read full T&Cs here.

Also, it looks like these pages are currently missing the brand disclaimer. Can you please confirm and update?

https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/car-insurance/

https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/claim/

https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/legal/

Thanks again,
Vivian

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Hope your weekend was great.

We just noticed that the brand disclaimer (that includes Car/Travel/Pet) in the footer seems to be missing on the new homepage that was switched over last Friday. Can you please confirm and update?

Also, are we able to add the promo disclaimer (below) including the hyperlinks on the new homepage footer? This can sit under the brand disclaimer.

This promo disclaimer is only for display temporarily for the duration of the Black Friday Offer.

*Underwriting criteria, policy terms and conditions, limits, sub-limits and exclusions apply. Promotional Ts&Cs apply. The '$50 eGift Card' promotion offer is available from 16/11/2023 - 30/11/2023 (AEDT) via unique link by using the redemption code BLKFRIDAY50 when purchasing a new Stella Comprehensive Car Insurance policy at online checkout. Available to new Stella customers only. Not to be used in conjunction with any other offer. Limit of one gift card per customer. Prezzee do not sell insurance and insurance enquiries or enquiries regarding this offer should be directed to Stella Insurance. Exchange your Smart eGift Card for any retailer Gift Card of your choice. Must exchange for a Gift Card of equal amount. Prezzee Smart eGift Card has a 36-month expiry date for users to redeem the value for a Retailer Gift Card of choice. Once the new Gift Card has been selected new expiry dates will be set and terms and conditions apply to the specific Retailer Gift Card chosen. You need to hold your policy for 30 days and have paid your first premium or instalment to be eligible. If you do not activate the Reward Code within 2 months of it being emailed to you, you will forfeit the eGift Card. Your gift card will be emailed 35 days from commencement date of your policy that remain active. You must activate your Reward Card within 2 months of it being emailed to you. You are only entitled to one digital reward voucher during the offer period even if you purchase more than one eligible insurance policy. For more details, please read full T&Cs here.

If you can confirm once both have been actioned that would be great.

Thanks,
Vivian
